summary: Changes the texture of Imperial \'studded\' armor to look more like Chainmail
descriptionHtml:
:EDIT: 
For some reason I can\'t upload the file to Nexus, it keeps timing out.. and I have no idea how to fix it >_<

So for now just use the mirror on Tesalliance.

:EDIT-2:
Managed to upload the file =D
---------------------------------------------------------------

I was pretty dissapointed there was no form of chainmail armor at all in the game.
The Imperial \'studded\' armor had a little bit of chainmail around the shoulders... wich just looked silly.

So I\'ve retextured the armor to look like chainmail.

Only male at the moment, I haven\'t got around to texturing the female version yet.
Might make some more chainmail armors later on....
author: Wintercross
